channel.title: Bukkit 1.8 Released!
channel.description: Bukkit 1.8 has been released yesterday, still some bugs though...are you going to update yet or wait till its less buggy?

uhm bukkit 1.8 recommended build was released…when are u upgrading?? :rolleyes:

item.title: Bukkit 1.8 Released!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:18, topic:414835”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=516795.msg3755511#msg3755511 date=1316402253]

What makes any of you think that ‘payed’ players aren’t griefers as well?

The fact that even though there isn’t much of a player base for David’s temp server, it’s much more mature than I had originally expected it to be. It proves that people who care about the game, will pay for it.
[/quote]

We made a pit to bedrock and called it the tomb of the banished… idk if that’s mature or not. It sure is funny as hell trying to make jrub fall in it though.[/quote]
WOT

Read full topic

The fact that even though there isn’t much of a player base for David’s temp server, it’s much more mature than I had originally expected it to be. It proves that people who care about the game, will pay for it.[/quote]

item.title: Bukkit 1.8 Released!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Moparisthebest:

What makes any of you think that ‘payed’ players aren’t griefers as well?

well they can’t keep making accounts and griefing/hacking… they won’t spend like $20 every day or two just to grief a minecraft server that everything they did can be rolled back…

item.title: Bukkit 1.8 Released!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:12, topic:414835”]Maybe make it paid only but have a whitelist for non-paid players? It would reduce activity a lot, but only serious players would bother applying. I know that if I was trolling servers I wouldn’t bother applying for a whitelist, I’d just find another server.

And who cares about a high player count anyway? All we want is a close community who act responsibly, so it’s worth sacrificing player count to achieve it.

Also, more players = more lag!![/quote]
This is all true

Read full topic

item.title: Bukkit 1.8 Released!
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

Maybe make it paid only but have a whitelist for non-paid players? It would reduce activity a lot, but only serious players would bother applying. I know that if I was trolling servers I wouldn’t bother applying for a whitelist, I’d just find another server.

And who cares about a high player count anyway? All we want is a close community who act responsibly, so it’s worth sacrificing player count to achieve it.

Also, more players = more lag!!

Read full topic

nty. I don’t want non paid griefers flying around.

Fine. lets make w2 payed only :o

i would… but… er… no cashez on me sorry
